name: Delivery Elf - Christmas Game 2D Puzzle Platformer
name_original: Delivery Elf - Christmas Game 2D Puzzle Platformer
description:
Use your cunning platforming & puzzle-solving skills in order to quickly deliver presents before Christmas is over!

This game combines tight movement and a fun atmosphere to create the ultimate Christmas puzzle platformer. The game can be played with either a keyboard or a game-pad/controller.

Make sure to give us a follow to receive updates in the near future!

Latest Update:

  • 5 more unique levels!
  • Menu sounds
  • Fixes on previous levels
  • Better working UI

Planned Updates:

  • More levels!
  • More game mechanics
  • Improved and fine-tuned movement
  • Better visual feedback
  • Online scoreboards

Donations and feedback are very appreciated and will contribute to further development. 

Merry Christmas everyone :)
